Our loved ones deserves the best possible care

ARE YOU READY TO MOVE IN? ENQUIRE TODAY !!

Personalized Care

We offer personalized care (bathing, dressing) for individuals, and support elders in all activities.
Read More

Dementia Care

We provide a specialized dementia care program that has been shown to reduce anxiety, repeated questions, aggression and depression.
Read More

Professional Nursing Services

At Silver Homes Pune, We provide medical and nursing care for seniors.
Read More

About Us

For elderly people in need, Silver Homes Oldage Home and Dementia Care Center was established in Pune. The main goal of the senior care facility is to look after and support them while showing compassion, empathy, and kindness.

We specialize in providing daily living assistance to a variety of people who require care. Intruder protection and assistance in living a safe and secure life are provided by Silver Homes Senior citizen care services in Pune for your loved ones.

The quality of an old age home is determined not only by the accommodations it offers, but also by the possibilities it provides for being active, mentally and physically stimulated, and engaged.

We engage in activities such as exercising & fitness, brain games, events, talks, charity, palliative care, etc.

LEARN MORE ABOUT US
Silver Homes Pune | Old Age Homes in Maharashtra

Silver homes is a Pune based old age care home. Silver Home’s journey began from 17th Sept 2017. We have 2 location in pune equipped with all modern necessities attached with an hospitals back up by ONP Hospitals. Silver Homes is an 100 bed capacity old age home.

“Caring for seniors is a labor of love and requires a special person”

We welcome seniors of all age to Silver Homes

Our Features

Better clinical results and capacity to control a range of chronic medical conditions.

Increased emotional stability and interpersonal engagement, enhancing quality of life.

Excellent dementia and memory care with ongoing training for caregivers in modern best practices.

A pleasant residential atmosphere with spacious single rooms, double rooms for sharing, and lots of natural light.

Our Vision

To enhance efforts towards excellence of service through:

– Seeking to continuously meet client’s expectation.

– Seeking to consistently deliver high quality services to senior citizens.

– Seeking to be a leader and its center for senior citizen’s services nationally.

Our Core Values

We are devoted to the underlying some core values that our founders have established.

 सेवाभाव

Service With
Compassion

सद्‍‍भावना

Good Will & Positive Feeling

सहकार्य

Collaboration & Team Work

सहयोग

Co-ordination &
Team Work

Why Choose Us?

Our history in medical field began 60 years age. Shree clinic was our first establishment. We also worked with PMC hospitals (Dalvi hospital) for 7 years. Currently we are working at 2 different locations in Pune city and Silver Homes is one of our establishment which runs for senior citizens.

Our mission is to improve the quality of life for those who are suffering with dementia and other chronic diseases and also who are in need of professional nursing services. Silver Homes retirement homes serves through the delivery of clinical excellence, superior service and compassionate care.

Silver Homes is a home away from home.

Get Back to Your Life

We aim to provide excellent and accessible resources that improve the quality of life for seniors, their caregivers and the community.

24/7 Availability

Whether it be about therapy options, nursing solutions, the admissions process, we are available to answer any questions you may have regarding skilled nursing facilities.

Excellent Quality of Life

We have an array of social, recreational and religious activities within our bright and cheery surroundings that allow residents to enjoy their stay.

Our Videos

Meet our Healthcare Experts

Dr. Amita Phadnis, M.D

Pediatrics & Neonatology

Dr. Amita Phadnis, M.D

Pediatrics & Neonatology

In 1992, she set up the first tertiary level Neonatal ICU in Pune called Neo Clinic, equipped with a specialized pediatric ambulance. The pediatrics & neonatology department of Oyster & Pearl Hospital has to its credit the smallest surviving newborn baby of india. With various initiatives for women and child health, she is a torchbearer of pediatric care in pune and western maharashtra.
  • Phone:+91-937 381 3040
  • Email:website@onphospital.org

Dr. Avinash Phadnis, M.D

Obstetrics & Gynaecology, IVF Specialist, Laparoscopic Surgeon

Dr. Avinash Phadnis, M.D

Obstetrics & Gynaecology, IVF Specialist, Laparoscopic Surgeon

MD (OBGYN) from Mumbai University, where vast exposure to a variety of cases and working with the Doyens of OBGYN, has made him one of the best clinicians and surgeons. Specialization in Microsurgery, IVF, and Laparoscopic surgical techniques has enabled him to be abreast with the advances in OBGYN.
  • Phone:+91-937 381 3040
  • Email:website@onphospital.org

Testimonials

My mother Smt Usha Kulkarni is 98 years old. For the last 2 years, we have been keeping her in Silver Homes from time to time and our experience with the management and staff is very satisfactory. Mrs. Padalkar and Mr. Kamble are very caring and personally take care of senior citizens staying there. However, there is scope for improvement in services.
Mr. N Kulkarni
Pune
My mother is in Silver Homes from last 6 months. We are having very nice experience with this senior citizen home.
Mr Ajay Korgaonkar
Thane
1.You have a good facility.
2. Food and service is excellent.
3. Ms. Padalkar and Mr Kamble provide responsive support.
4. Staff is caring and warm.
Chetan Shrotri
Mumbai
